results.title: Early childhood
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Personality”.
The experiences of pre-school children play a role in all aspects of their personality development. While there are many personality traits developing during this age period, several are of special significance: dependence, identification, aggression, fear and anxiety.

group_works.title: Hiroyuki Iwaki
group_works.creator_credit: Keizai Koho Senta (Tokyo, Japan)

results.title: Hiroyuki Iwaki
results.brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “Personalities of Today”.
Shows day to day life of renowned Japanese conductor, Hiroyuki Iwaki as he is interviewed by music critic, Marcel Grily. Includes background scenes of city/country life in Japan and also shows Iwaki conducting in various European cities. Features the NHK Symphony Orchestra, Tokyo.
results.description:

results.title: Let habit help
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Personal Side of Safety”.
Safety lies in the kind of habits we have - good habits or dangerous habits. Shows the worker how to analyse themself - how to build up good habits that lead to safety.

results.title: Safety record
results.creator_credit: Glenn Griffin, Roland D. Blake and Sarra
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Personal Side of Safety”.
Quotes company records to prove to workers that safety is successful, modern, and popular, and that safety is accomplished by the individual.

results.title: Get a grip on yourself
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Personal Side of Safety”.
Points out that the control of emotion is necessary in order to be safe on the job and avoid serious accidents. Explains how to recognize emotions and what causes them, and suggests how to control emotions

results.title: Decide to be safe
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Personal Side of Safety”.
Shows that safety comes with decision. Points out that the worker must decide to be safe and build up a reserve of safety knowledge on what to do in any situation.
